title: Pixel 2 XL restore from backup not showing up
content:
I have a backup from my old pixel 2 in my google drive account. Yet when I try to set up my new device it is not showing up. I can see all my other devices but not the pixel 2 backup.
The new device if fully updated to Android 9.0, Security Patch: 5. July
My old phone broke on 17. June and this is also the date of the last backup... 
I was not running any beta versions.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
